--- backgroundcolor: "" image: images/world-map.png image-alt: "R-Ladies Global Map" about: template: marquee #image-width: 35em #25 # links: # - text: "Introduction" # href: introduction.qmd # - text: "About" # file: about.qmd # - text: "Talks" # file: talks/index.qmd id: hero-heading sidebar: false listing: contents: - /blog/posts - /talks/2023/meetup - /talks/2024/meetup sort: "date desc" type: grid image-height: "200" max-items: 3 categories: false page-layout: full title-block-banner: true format: html --- ::: {.cell} ::: ::: {style="margin-top: 10px; font-size: 3em; color: #572455;"} Welcome to R-Ladies Rome ::: ::: {style="font-size: 1.2em; color: #a68ba5;"} Part of R-Ladies Global, organization designed to develop the R skills and knowledge of our members at all user levels, supporting access to STEM skills and careers for minority identities. We are proud members of both the Free Software Movement and the global R community. :::
